description: The upper portion of Skypiea where the ancient city of Shandora once stood. It is the main battleground for Enel's survival game, where various factions fight for control.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Braham - Aerial Battle
keyEvents.description: Zoro battles Braham in mid-air combat over Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle location for the survival game.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Debuts 36 Pound Cannon
keyEvents.description: Zoro unveils his new flying slash technique in Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: Location of an important technique debut.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Wyper Battle
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Wyper begin their confrontation in Upper Yard.

statusHistory.reason: Main battlefield for the Skypiea arc conflicts

description: The ancient ruins within Upper Yard, remnants of the city of Shandora. This is where Chopper encounters the priest Gedatsu.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Arrives at the Ruins
keyEvents.description: Tony Tony Chopper arrives at the ancient ruins.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up Chopper's encounter with Gedatsu.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Encounters Gedatsu
keyEvents.description: Chopper meets the priest Gedatsu at the ruins.
keyEvents.significance: Location where their battle will take place.

statusHistory.reason: Ancient ruins serving as a key location in the arc

name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, currently docked in the Skypiea area. In this episode, it becomes the target of Enel's attack.

keyEvents.title: Enel Arrives at the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Enel appears on the Straw Hats' ship and declares those aboard as participants in his survival game.
keyEvents.significance: Major escalation as Enel directly targets the ship.

keyEvents.title: Enel Attacks on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Enel defeats Sanji on the Going Merry using his lightning powers.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Defeated on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Enel also defeats Usopp on the ship.
keyEvents.significance: Leaves the Going Merry vulnerable to Enel.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as the Straw Hats' ship
